1. DEFINITIONS

For purposes of this Agreement, the following terms shall have the meanings set forth below:

1.1 "Company" means ABC Corporation, a Delaware corporation.

1.2 "Employee" means John Smith, an individual residing in California.

5. CONFIDENTIALITY OBLIGATIONS

5.1 Employee agrees to maintain the confidentiality of all Confidential Information.

5.2 Employee shall not disclose Confidential Information to any third party.

5.3 Employee shall use Confidential Information solely for the benefit of Company.

5. CONFIDENTIALITY OBLIGATIONS (DUPLICATE)

5.1 Employee agrees to maintain the confidentiality of all Confidential Information.

5.2 Employee shall not disclose Confidential Information to any third party.

5.3 Employee shall use Confidential Information solely for the benefit of Company.

6. TERM AND TERMINATION

6.1 This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and continue for a period of two (2) years.

6.2 Either party may terminate this Agreement upon thirty (30) days written notice.

6.3 Upon termination, Employee shall return all Confidential Information to Company.

7. GENERAL PROVISIONS

7.1 This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of California.

7.2 This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the date first written above.
